CustomField.description: Patient status codes for Status = Cancelled
CustomField.formula: CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Status__c, "Cancelled", CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Sub_Status__c, "Missing Information, Max Attempts","C01", "Indication Criteria Not Met","C02", "Requirement Not Met - Patient Residency","C03", "Requirement Not Met - Prescriber License","C04", "Unable to Reach Patient on Required Contact, Max Attempts","C05", "Unable to Reach Prescriber on Required Contact, Max Attempts","C06", "Patient Decision - Alternate Therapy","C07", "Patient Decision - Financial","C08", "Patient Decision - Other","C09", "Prescriber Decision - Alternate Therapy","C10", "Prescriber Decision - Financial","C11", "Prescriber Decision - Coverage Effort","C12", "Prescriber Decision - Other","C13", "Patient Medical Delay, Max Delay","C14", "No Route of Access","C15", "Patient Deceased","C17", "Other","C18", "Clinical Trial","C19", "No coverage: Appeals exhausted and PAP ineligible","C20", "Patient does not want infusion","C21", "Administration Barrier","C22", null), null)
CustomField.label: Status Code - Cancelled
